member.name: T:FyndSharp.Utilities.Common.Checker
member.summary: provides a set of runtime validations for inputs

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Common.Checker.Assert``1(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Verifies that the condition is true and if it fails constructs the specified type of exception and throws.

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Common.Checker.Assert``1(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that the condition is true and if it fails constructs the specified type of exception with any arguments provided and throws.

member.summary: Verifies that the condition is true and if it fails throws the execption returned by fnExceptionBuilder()

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Common.Checker.Assert``1(System.Boolean,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Verifies that the condition is true and if it fails constructs the specified type of exception with any arguments provided and throws.

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Common.Checker.NotNull``1(``0)
member.summary: Verifies that value is not null and returns the value or throws ArgumentNullException

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Common.Checker.NotEmpty(System.String)
member.summary: Verfies that the string is not null and not empty and returns the string. throws ArgumentNullException, ArgumentOutOfRangeException

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Common.Checker.NotEmpty(System.Guid)
member.summary: Verfies that the Guid is not empty. throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Common.Checker.NotEmpty``1(``0)
member.summary: Verfies that the collection is not null and not empty and returns the collection. throws ArgumentNullException, ArgumentOutOfRangeException

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Common.Checker.IsEqual``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Verifies that the two values are the same throws ArgumentException

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Common.Checker.NotEqual``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Verifies that the two values are NOT the same throws ArgumentException

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Common.Checker.ArraySize``1(``0[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Verifies that the array is not empty and has at least min, but not more than max items. throws ArgumentNullExcpetion throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Common.Checker.InRange``1(``0,``0,``0)
member.summary: Verifies that the value is min, max, or between the two. throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Common.Checker.IsAssignable``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns (T)value if the object provided can be assinged to a variable of type T throws ArgumentException

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Common.Checker.IsAssignable(System.Type,System.Object)
member.summary: Returns value if the object provided can be assinged to a variable of type toType throws ArgumentException

member.summary: Throws ArgumentException if the type fromType cannot be assigned to variable of type toType

member.name: T:FyndSharp.Utilities.Common.Checker.ExceptionBuilder
member.summary: Used to delay creation of the excpetion until the condition fails.

member.name: T:FyndSharp.Utilities.Collections.SynchronizedSortedList`2
member.summary: This class is used to store key-value based items in a thread safe manner. It uses System.Collections.Generic.SortedList internally.

member.summary: Internal collection to store items.

member.name: F:FyndSharp.Utilities.Collections.SynchronizedSortedList`2._Lock
member.summary: Used to synchronize access to _items list.

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Collections.SynchronizedSortedList`2.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new ThreadSafeSortedList object.

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Collections.SynchronizedSortedList`2.ContainsKey(`0)
member.summary: Checks if collection contains spesified key.
member.returns: True; if collection contains given key

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Collections.SynchronizedSortedList`2.ContainsValue(`1)
member.summary: Checks if collection contains spesified item.
member.returns: True; if collection contains given item

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Collections.SynchronizedSortedList`2.Remove(`0)
member.summary: Removes an item from collection.

member.summary: Removes all items from list.

member.summary: Gets then removes all items in collection.
member.returns: Item list

member.summary: Gets/adds/replaces an item by key.
member.returns: Item associated with this key

member.summary: Gets count of items in the collection.

member.name: P:FyndSharp.Utilities.Collections.SynchronizedSortedList`2.Values
member.summary: Gets all items in collection.
member.returns: Item list

member.summary: This class is used to process items sequentially in a multithreaded manner.

member.summary: The method delegate that is called to actually process items.

member.summary: Item queue. Used to process items sequentially.

member.summary: Indicates state of the item processing.

member.summary: A boolean value to control running of SequentialItemProcessor.

member.name: F:FyndSharp.Utilities.Threading.SequentialItemProcessor`1._SyncObject
member.summary: An object to synchronize threads.

member.summary: Creates a new SequentialItemProcessor object.

member.summary: Adds an item to queue to process the item.
member.param: Item to add to the queue

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Threading.SequentialItemProcessor`1.Start
member.summary: Starts processing of items.

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Threading.SequentialItemProcessor`1.Stop
member.summary: Stops processing of items and waits stopping of current item.

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Threading.SequentialItemProcessor`1.ProcessItem
member.summary: This method runs on a new seperated Task (thread) to process items on the queue.

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Common.TypeConvert.ToJson(System.Object)
member.summary: 尝试将对象转换JSON格式的扩展方法
member.exception: 所生成的 JSON 字符串超出了 System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.MaxJsonLength 的值。- 或 - obj 包含循环引用。当子对象引用父对象，而父对象又引用子对象时，将会发生循环引用。
超出了由 System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.RecursionLimit 定义的递归限制。

member.name: M:FyndSharp.Utilities.Common.TypeConvert.ToSequenceString(System.Collections.IEnumerable,System.String,FyndSharp.Utilities.Common.TypeConvert.ToStringFunction)
member.summary: 将对象集合转换成半角逗号分隔的，用于SQL语句中IN子句的字符串
member.param: 用该参数对应的字符串将对象的字符串形式包裹起来
对象转换成字符串的代理函数，在需要将对象转换成字符串时会使用该代理方法的返回值替换默认对象字符串值
